sentences.sContent: Businesses are investing millions of dollars to gain a foothold in this new market.
sentences.sCn: 商家们正投资数百万美元以求在新市场中赢得立足点。

sentences.sContent: ...The bid went instead to Fuji, which exploited its sponsorship to win a permanent foothold in the marketplace...

words.tran: 基础；立足处；社会关系；合计
步行；在…上行走；总计（foot的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 立足处（攀登时脚踩的地方）
trans.tranOther: a position from which you can start to make progress and achieve your aims
